entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
